title: Wherever more than the minimum front and marginal spaces have been provided, such additional area provided may be considered as part of the AOS in the project comprising both rehabilitation and free sale components, and without charging any premium in relaxation of the stipulations in DCR No
clause_text: Wherever more than the minimum front and marginal spaces have been provided, such additional area provided may be considered as part of the AOS in the project comprising both rehabilitation and free sale components, and without charging any premium in relaxation of the stipulations in DCR No.27, wherever necessary.
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
